channel.title: Mapdata
channel.description:
Was wondering how you would...Well, copy a current area of the runescape map and paste it somewhere else. Like...Copy lumbridge...And paste it at coordinates 4000 4000. I was told to edit the mapdata, but I am not aware of how to do this, help please?
Keep searching for something like it and cannot find anything.

item.title: Mapdata
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

[quote=“Tonic, post:4, topic:289762”][quote author=Setsuna link=topic=383030.msg2876336#msg2876336 date=1248062539]

you’d need to update the whole mapdata in your cache, tbh idk how atm, im currently trying to get gwd in a 317 myself

Well I’ve seen people do it…For instance…I believe Frugoo had something similar to POH’s on a 317.

What I mainly want to do is just be able to create new areas out in the black space. At location 4000 4000…For example, because I need a very large, completely flat, area.
[/quote]

Yea Im looking for the wildy ditch mapdata[/quote]

I’m just looking to make a completely new area. Like with a map editor, but the only ones I know of cannot edit black area.

Read full topic
